items.title: How Notre Dame’s opponents fared in week 13 of the college football season
items.summary: Notre Dame got off to a rough start in 2025, but they looked like they fixed a few things in a 56-30 win over the Purdue Boilermakers and then the 56-13 win on the road against the Arkansas Razorbacks. They followed those two victories with two victories which covered massive spreads in a 28-7 win […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football Stats: Week 13 Review of Win over Syracuse
items.summary: We expected the Week 13 slate of the 2025-26 season to be “less than competitive.”  There weren’t a lot of big shocks across the sport but Notre Dame did stand out for the punishment it dealt to Syracuse.  The game’s final score was 70-7 and it presents us with some of the wildest stats College Football has […]

items.title: Three Things We Saw in Notre Dame’s Win Over Syracuse
items.summary: Notre Dame took on what remains of the Syracuse Orange on Saturday and the result was, apart from a scary injury to Kyngstonn Viliamu-Asa, about as close to perfect as you’ll find on a football field. It’s genuinely hard to pick out the most interesting or meaningful performers in a game so lopsided it was […]

items.title: #9 Notre Dame VS Syracuse Orange Discussion
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish are back at home this week — and for the final time during the regular season. It’s Senior Day in South Bend and the Irish welcome the Syracuse Orange to the show. There could still be a lot of chaos around college football. For Notre Dame, however, there is a […]

items.title: STAFF PICKS: #9 Notre Dame Fighting Irish VS Syracuse Orange
items.summary: The Notre Dame Fighting Irish have slowly climbed back up the rankings, and are now ranked #9 in the country in the college football playoff rankings after dismantling Pitt. Next up for the Irish is the Syracuse Orange in a game that will feel like a major disappointment if Notre Dame doesn’t win by a […]

items.title: Notre Dame Football: Syracuse Orange Q&A with Troy Nunes Is An Absolute Magician
items.summary: Well folks, I have no idea how we already made it here — it seems like just yesterday we were waiting until a Sunday night to watch CJ Carr throw 1000 screens against a Miami team who hasn’t looked that good since — but it’s officially Senior Day and the final home game of the […]
